title: Preparation of nickel foam modified by multiwalled hollow spheres of NiCo2O4 as a promising non-enzymatic glucose sensor
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10768-10775
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08663A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Nada Eprilia, Afiten R. Sanjaya, Respati K. Pramadewandaru, Tiara A. H. Pertiwi, Yulia M. T. A. Putri, Isnaini Rahmawati, Beti E. Dewi, Yuni K. Krisnandi, Hoeil Chung, Tribidasari A. Ivandini
Nickel foam modified by hollow sphere NiCo2O4 particles was successfully prepared via a hydrothermal method. Investigation of the NiCo2O4-modified nickel foam as an electrode for the detection of glucose in sodium hydroxide solution showed high linearity of the anodic currents.
